Its core programs are the following: Professional Staff Services Program, Workers Guild Development Program, Enterprise Development Program, and Consultancy Services.

** CCT staff and volunteers regularly conducts fellowship meeting for the factory workers before starting their daily work routine. Bible readings, prayer devotions and spiritual mentoring and discipleship sessions take place during pre and post working hours and breaks, powering up the lives of both volunteer leaders and line workers.

loans.use: To repurchase the ATM card that she pawned

loans.name: Amalia

texts.en:
Amalia is 45 years old and married with three children.

Amalia is in the agricultural business, farming sugar cane in the Philippines. Amalia has requested a PHP 21,000 loan through NWTF in order to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies.

Amalia has been farming sugar cane for seven years now, and has borrowed eleven times in the past from NWTF and more recently, from Kiva to sustain it.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to save enough money to expand her business and repair her family's home.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies.

loans.name: Nida

texts.en:
Nida is 50 years old and married with three children. All three children are currently in school, Nida works very hard to provide for them.

Nida runs a general store in the Philippines and has requested a PHP 30,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional stocks to sell like canned goods, soft-drinks, noodles, coffee, sugar, milk, spices, etc.

Nida has been in this business for three years.

She would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional stock to sell like canned goods, soft-drinks, noodles, coffee, sugar, milk, spices, etc.

loans.name: Carol

texts.en:
Carol is 37 years old and has five children. She is married and has four children who are in school.

Carol is in the agricultural business raising pigs in the Philippines. Carol has requested a PHP 27,000 loan through NWTF to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

Carol has been in this business for seven years now, and has borrowed twelve times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Carol would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Anik

texts.en:
Anik is 55 years old and she lives in the village of Tsovagyugh in the Gegharkunik region. Anik graduated from medical nursing college, and for 16 years she worked in her specialty. Now, with her beloved husband, she is engaged in farming and agriculture. Their single son now lives and works  abroad. 

On in her farm, Anik has 3 cows, 2 calves, a bull, 2 pigs, 8 sheep and 16 chickens. So her farm products’ assortment for sale is not small; she sells milk, cheese, macun (a national dairy-product), meat (pork, mutton, beef) and eggs right from her house.  Anik’s husband cultivates potatoes on their plot of land, and it is mainly for sale. The vegetable re-sellers buy from this region a lot, and with good prices, so the sale of potatoes is the most profitable among other vegetables. This peasant family greatly enjoys their farming activities, and they are happy to be healthy and hale to work on their land, to and to care their farm cattle. 

Anik asks a loan of 500,000 Armenian drams, as she wants to buy potato seedlings, fertilizer and diesel fuel for spring sowing, and also animal fodder for her farm cattle.

loans.use: to buy potato seedlings, fertilizer and diesel fuel for spring sowing and also animal fodder for her farm cattle

loans.name: Nenita

texts.en:
Nenita is 45 years old and married with two children, one of whom is in school. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. 

Nenita has a general store business in the Philippines. Nenita has requested a PHP 19,000 loan amount through NWTF in order to purchase more groceries to sell in her store.

Nenita has been in this business for twelve years. In the future, Nenita would like to save enough money to expand her business and repair her family's home.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell in her store.

loans.name: Mbuni Grp Musoma Group

texts.en:
Aloyce, who is in his early 20s, is married with one child, who is still small.  He has been running two projects, a motorcycle for transportation business and fish selling, for four years now.   He works from 07 am to 09 pm daily and is able to make a small monthly profit.

This will be Aloyce's second loan from Tujijenge Tanzania. He used the previous loan to service his motorcycle and start selling fish.  He has paid back his loan successfully. He used the profit to increase the fish, and for household expenses.  

He will use this loan to increase the fish stock and serve more customers. He dreams of buying his own motorcycle. 

Aloyce will share this loan with his loan group, "MBUNI GRP MUSOMA", which has three members who will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to increase the fish stock to serve more customers.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: To restock products in her salon

loans.name: Josie

texts.en:
Josie joined PMPC for her financial needs. She knew this would be her last chance to get back on her feet after she went broke after her first business went bad. PMPC to Josie came as a rescue for lending her money when she needed it the most. 

Now, she availed another loan for the next cropping season. She borrowed an amount for land and seedbed preparation.  

Josie perseveres, and always believes in reaching her goals to continuously provide for her family.

loans.use: to pay for land and seedbed preparation

location.town: Pagadian - Pagadian City, Zamboanga del Sur

loans.name: Bernandita

texts.en:
Bernandita is 65 years old and lives in Pagadian City, Zamboanga del Sur, Philippines. She is married with five adult-age children. 

She has a shop that sells different styles of garland, and has had this business for four years. 

She requested a loan to buy raw materials for garland making that she can sell for all occasions. 

In the future, Bernandita hopes to sustain their needs.

loans.use: to buy raw materials for garland making

loans.name: Quirino

texts.en:
Quirino is 58 years old. He is known in the Pagadian area for his barber shop. Quirino is actively participating in the various programs and services that the Co-op offers. 

Quirino hopes to live comfortably in a decent house, for which he has applied for a loan to purchase plywood, nails, and studs. 

Quirino hopes to maintain his membership in good standing with a good repayment record. It matters that he has been given a priority as a member of Paglaum Multi-Purpose Cooperative (PMPC). He is thankful that all of the financing needs of his business are supported by PMPC.

loans.use: to purchase plywood, nails, and sticks for his house.

location.town: Pagadian - Pagadian City, Zamboanga del Sur

loans.name: Marites

texts.en:
Marites is 32 years old and married with three beautiful children. 

Marites has been a wholesaler of bananas in their town for almost three years. From her experience of selling, she already has great knowledge in dealing with this kind of business. Even though there are many competitors in the town, Marites still gets more customers than the rest due to her good salesmanship and characteristic effort. 

Over the years, Marites has been successful and she manages to save money for her family. 

Now, Marites is planning to buy more inventory of mangoes. To fund this project, she needs additional capital to purchase 500 kilos of mangoes for wholesale, so she has requested a loan from Paglaum Multi-Purpose Cooperative (PMPC).

loans.use: to purchase 500 kilos of mangoes for wholesale

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more vegetables to increase the stock in her husband's shop

loans.name: Lilibeth

texts.en:
From Cavite, Philippines, Lilibeth is married and has three children. She is employed in a garment factory in Cavite, through the auspices of the Center for Community Transformation Credit Cooperative (CCT). Lilibeth works as a seamstress, sewing clothing according to the company or client’s dictates. She uses a sewing machine and other stitching machines, as well as handstitching hems and linings.

One of the main dilemmas of employees like Lilibeth is meeting family expenses without access to savings or credit. Workers can become heavily indebted to money lenders, who take their ATM cards as loan collateral. 

For this reason, Lilibeth is asking for your assistance to help her circumvent loan sharks. She has previously accessed loans through CCT, and had no problem in repaying them, since the loan payments were automatically deducted from her paycheck. 

She is seeking a 10,000 PHP loan to pay for her youngest child’s tuition.

Lilibeth hopes to give her family a better life in the future. She looks forward to your positive response, and says any amount will surely be of great help. 

CCT works to provide local communities with a trained labor force and equipped with the skills required for employment in construction and site development projects. The cooperative assists its members in acquiring those skills necessary for quality jobs, cultivating savings consciousness and providing decent shelter, food, and education for their families. Its core programs include Professional Staff Services, Workers Guild Development, Enterprise Development and Consultancy Services.

CCT staff and volunteers regularly conduct fellowship meetings for factory workers such as Levita before starting their daily work routine. Bible readings, prayer devotions, spiritual mentoring and discipleship sessions take place during pre- and after-work hours and breaks, powering up the lives of both volunteer leaders and line workers.

loans.use: To pay for the school fee of her youngest child.

loans.name: Raulina

texts.en:
Raulina is 46 years old, residing at Pagadian City, Zamboanga del Sur, Philippines. She is married, and blessed with seven adult-age children. She joined PMPC on January 10, 2014 in order to access the programs and services of the coop. 

Recently, she's accessing her second loan in the amount of PHP 14,900 for additional working capital of her existing business to buy a variety of food commodity products to sell in the local community.

loans.use: to buy a variety of food commodities

location.town: Pagadian - Pagadian City, Zamboanga del Sur

loans.name: Emily Grace

texts.en:
Emily Grace is 27 years old, a single woman earning 3,500 a month through her cosmetics selling business. She wanted to display more variety of cosmetics goods to sell. She aims to increase her business income to have savings, to be able to afford having her life insured, and for saving. 

She joined GDMPC in 2015, to get a micro loan to finance her needs. 

She's now happily selling different beauty products such as hand and body lotion, perfumes, colognes, shampoos, hair conditioners, whitening soap, lipsticks, eyebrow and many more in her locality.

loans.use: To purchase a variety of beauty products

location.town: San Carlos, Tukuran Zamboanga del sur

loans.name: Viginia

texts.en:
As a married parent of nine children, Viginia works hard to support her family.

She has a buy & sell root crops business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from a general store. Viginia is borrowing PHP 18,000 through NWTF to buy more root crops to sell for her buy & sell root crop business.

Viginia has been sustaining her business activities through her past six loans from NWTF. She hopes that he hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more root crops

loans.name: Lorenzo Obdulio

texts.es:
El señor Lorenzo de 68  años de  edad, vive en su casa propia junto a su esposa e hijos,  se dedica desde hace 10  años al negocio de venta de leche y ganado, vive en la ciudad de San Lorenzo Valle,  al sur de Honduras.
Don Lorenzo vende vacas y terneros para destazo, sus clientes son todos sus vecinos, amistades y demás personas que transitan por la zona, el vende leche en su casa en botellas y sus clientes lo prefieren por su buen producto y buena atención.
Don Lorenzo es un hombre emprendedor  con deseos de salir adelante y lucha día con día para mejorar su calidad de vida, está solicitando el préstamo para comprar una vaca de buena raza a buen precio y luego poder venderla a un mejor precio.
Su sueño es  crecer con su negocio para mejorar su calidad de vida. 

San Lorenzo, Honduras – Enero del  2015.
texts.en:
Lorenzo, age 68, lives in his own house with his wife and children.  He has been in the business of selling milk and livestock for ten years.  He lives in the city of San Lorenzo Valle in southern Honduras.

Lorenzo sells cows and calves for butchering.  His customers are all neighbors, friends, and other people who pass through the area.  He sells milk in bottles at his house.  His customers prefer him because of his good product and good service.

Lorenzo is an enterprising man with the desire to get ahead.  He struggles day to day in order to improve his quality of life.  He is requesting the loan to buy a good breed of cow at a good price.  He will later be able to sell it for a better price.

His dream is to grow with his business in order to improve his quality of life.

San Lorenzo, Honduras – January, 2015.

loans.use: to buy a cow for his business.

loans.name: Maria Ideliza

texts.es:
María Ideliza tiene 57 años de edad, vive junto a su esposo en el distrito de Oyotún, un distrito conocido por los sembríos de arroz, maíz, algodón y comercio de animales menores, ubicado en la provincia de Chiclayo, que pertenece a la Región Lambayeque, costa norte del Perú.

Son una familia unida y emprendedora muy conocida por la labor que realizan, desde hace 10 años María Ideliza se dedica a la venta de abarrotes como arroz, azúcar, aceite, fideos, entre otros. Ella ha solicitado un préstamo para comprar una mayor cantidad de productos como arroz, leche, cereales y así incrementar su bodega y ofrecer una variedad de productos a sus clientes, de esta manera espera generar mayores ingresos para su familia y por brindarles una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
María Ideliza, age 57, lives with her husband in the Oyotún district.  The district is known for growing rice, corn, and cotton and for selling small animals.  It is in the Chiclayo province in the Lambayeque region on the northern coast of Peru.

They are a close and enterprising family that is very well-known for the work they do.  María Ideliza has been selling groceries like rice, sugar, cooking oil, and noodles, among other items, for ten years.

She has requested a loan to buy a greater quantity of products like rice, milk, and grains.  This way she will expand her store and offer a variety of products to her customers.  This way she hopes to generate greater earnings for her family and to provide her family with a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy a greater quantity of products like rice, milk, and grains to expand her store.

loans.name: Elma

texts.en: Elma is a businesswoman from Pagadian City. She is 40 years old, married, and has expertise in selling. She runs a little sari-sari store (general store) and earns a meager income that sufficiently supports her family. Elma is a full-fledged member of PMPC and has taken several loans already. She maintains her membership in good standing without records of default. Now, she has applied for a loan to restock the store with basic commodities and other consumable items. Elma continues to look for better business opportinuites, proof that she has the passion and the energy to make ends meet for her family.

loans.use: to restock her store with basic commodities and other consumable items

location.town: Pagadian - Pagadian City, Zamboanga del Sur

loans.name: Remilyn

texts.en:
From Cavite, Philippines, Remilyn is married and has children. She is employed in a garment factory in Cavite through the auspices of the Center for Community Transformation Credit Cooperative (CCT). Remilyn works as a seamstress, sewing clothing according to the company or client’s dictates. She uses a sewing machine and other stitching machines as well as handstitching hems and linings.

One of the main dilemmas of employees like Remilyn is meeting family expenses without access to savings or credit. Workers can become heavily indebted to money lenders who take their ATM cards as loan collateral. 

For this reason Remilyn is asking for your assistance to help her circumvent loan sharks. She has previously accessed loans through CCT and had no problem in repaying them since the loan payments were automatically deducted from her paycheck. She is seeking an 8,000 PHP loan to pay for the rent for her house.

Remilyn hopes to have her own business to earn additional income. She looks forward to your positive response and says any amount will surely be of great help. 

CCT works to provide local communities with a trained labor force and equipped with the skills required for employment in construction and site development projects. The cooperative assists its members in acquiring those skills necessary for quality jobs, cultivating savings consciousness and providing decent shelter, food, and education for their families. Its core programs include Professional Staff Services, Workers Guild Development, Enterprise Development and Consultancy Services.

CCT staff and volunteers regularly conduct fellowship meetings for factory workers such as Levita before starting their daily work routine. Bible readings, prayer devotions, spiritual mentoring and discipleship sessions take place during pre- and after-work hours and breaks, powering up the lives of both volunteer leaders and line workers.

loans.use: to pay for the rent on her house.

loans.name: Analyn

texts.en:
Analyn is 35 years old, married and has four children, one of whom is in school.

Analyn is in the agricultural business, raising pigs in the Philippines. Analyn has requested a PHP 19,000 loan through NWTF in order to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

Analyn has been raising pigs for five years now, and has borrowed six times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Analyn would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Oleg

texts.en:
Oleg is 40 years old. He lives is Kutaisi district and his family consists of his wife, his pensioner parents and three children. Oleg is unemployed at the moment and his family lives in poverty. There is a high unemployment rate in the region, but self-employment helps people to generate income.
 
The Start Up program, which is a joint initiative with Kiva and Credo enables Oleg to get a loan of 2,100 GEL. With the received credit Oleg will purchase a cow and his wife will produce dairy products to sell and consume at home. The Start Up program will be a great support for his family.

loans.use: to purchase a cow.

loans.name: Elias

texts.es:
Elias tiene 36 años de edad, es casado, vive con su familia en el distrito de Oyotún, es una zona rural que se encuentra ubicada en la provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, en la costa norte de Perú. La población del distrito se dedica a la agricultura, ganadería y comercio como actividades económicas principales.

El se dedica a brindar los servicios de albañilería, contando con herramientas propias, tiene más de 11 años de experiencia en el negocio y cuenta con buenas referencias personales y laborales en su distrito. Solicita préstamo para realizar reparaciones y mantenimiento de sus equipos y herramientas ya que actualmente se encuentran en mal estado, dicha inversión le servirá para tener en mejores condiciones sus equipos y herramientas lo que tendrá gran influencia en el negocio, con esto Elias espera mejorar la calidad de sus servicios y así poder atender las diversas necesidades de los clientes de la zona lo que le generará mayores ingresos y le permitirá mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Elias is 36 years old. He is married and lives with his family in the district of Oyotún. It is a rural area located in the province of Chiclayo, Lambayeque region, on the northern coast of  Peru. The district's population works in agriculture, raising cattle, and trade as main economic activities. 

He works as a bricklayer and has his own tools. He has more than 11 years' experience in the business and has good business and personal references in the district. He is asking for the loan to make repairs and do maintenance on hi equipment and tools, because right now they are in poor condition. This investment will help him to keep his equipment and tools in good condition, which will have a great influence on the business. With this, Elias hopes to improve the quality of his services and thus meet the needs of the diverse needs of the area customers. This will generate more income and will allow him to improve his and his family's quality of life.

loans.use: to make repairs and do maintenance on his equipment and tools, since right now they are in poor condition.

loans.name: Rachel

texts.en:
Rachel is 44 years old and is a very hard-working entrepreneur. 

Rachel has a fish vending business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF to buy more fish to sell in her fish stall.

Rachel has been in this business for 11 years. In the future, she would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more fish to sell in her fish stall

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to enhance her husband's pan shop

loans.name: Valeriano

texts.en:
Valeriano learned about Paglaum Multi Purpose Cooperative and the financial assistance it extends. He has a farm that he has worked on for several years now. He sought financial assistance from Paglaum and was able to roll the capitalization. 

Now, Valeriano has taken another loan amount to pay for seedlings and compost. This will help him in expanding his farm area. Valeriano looks for better business opportunities and would love to be in the position to help others.

loans.use: to pay for seedlings and compost

loans.name: Eleonor

texts.en:
Eleonor is 53 years old and married with six children. She earns a living by pig fattening in the Philippines. Eleonor has been pig fattening for 1 year and also earns additional income from food vending.

Eleonor is borrowing 12,000 PHP through NWTF to buy additional sacks of feed to sell. She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy additional sacks of feed to sell

loans.name: Ginna

texts.en:
Ginna is 48 years old and married with two children.

Ginna works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a 10,000 PHP loan through NWTF to purchase additional items to sell like beverages, condiments, canned goods, groceries, etc..

Ginna has borrowed and paid 8 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 9 years and also earns an income from food vending. She successfully repaid her previous loan and now she has requested another loan to further build her businesses.

Ginna aspires to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional items to sell like beverages, condiments, canned goods, groceries, etc.

loans.name: Rudy Alberto

texts.es:
A sus 27 años de edad el joven Rudy es licenciado en ciencias Comerciales, graduado anteriormente de perito mercantil y contador publico, apasionado por las matemáticas y por enseñar a los demás. Actualmente reside en compañía de su madre quien desde pequeño le inculco los  mejores valores y amor al trabajo y es por eso que este año desea continuar superándose y así poder obtener su maestría en dirección empresarial y comercio internacional ya que la competitividad laboral en el país cada vez es mas fuerte y el poder posicionarse dentro de una empresa para lograr sus metas laborales se ha convertido en su principal motivación.
Actualmente labora como docente de educación comercial y consejero estudiantil ya que se considera un joven sumamente pro-activo, solidario, comprensivo, respetuoso y con ética profesional en las diferentes situaciones de su vida. El poder ser un joven competente en el ámbito laboral considera que es una manera de poder contribuir a su país de manera provechosa ya que los jóvenes actualmente tienen el potencial y las ideas innovadoras que cualquier empresa desearía obtener.

Agradece a las personas que apoyan a jóvenes como él a construir un mejor mañana y crean oportunidades para miles de jóvenes que vienen atrás y desean tener una empleo digno y un futuro.
texts.en:
At 27 years old, Rudy has a bachelor degree in Commercial Science, having graduated previously from high school with a business specialization and as a certified public accountant. He has a passion for math and for teaching others. Right now, he lives with his mother, who since he was little taught him good values and a love of work. That is why this year he wants to continue getting ahead and be able to get his masters in business administration and international trade. Professional competition in the country is always getting stronger and being able to position oneself in business to meet his professional goals has become his main motivation.

Right now, he works as an instructor of business education and as a student counselor, because he is a young man who is very proactive, supportive, understanding, respectful, and with a professional ethic in the different situations of his life. He considers being able to be a competent young man in the work arena as a way to be able to contribute to his country in a productive way, because young people nowadays have the potential and innovating ideas that any business would like to have. 

He is grateful to the people who support young people like him to build a better tomorrow and who create opportunities for thousands of young people who are coming up and want to have a dignified job and future.

loans.use: to continue studying to get his masters in business administration and international trade.

loans.name: Upol

texts.ru: Упол, 34 года, замужем, мать 2 детей дошкольного возраста. Упол в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи занимается животноводством, стартовав 4 года назад. Благодаря упорному труду Упол в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется 4 коровы, 1 лошадь, 18 овец. Упол в целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 40,000 сом (KGS) на покупку 10 овец для разведения. Доходы от кредита Упол вложит в расширение бизнеса.
texts.en:
Upol is 34 years old and the married mother of two young children.  Her family's main source of income is the animal husbandry business Upol started four years ago.  As a result of her hard work, today she has four cows, a horse, and 18 sheep.

With the goal of further developing her business, Upol applied to Bai Tushum Bank CJSC for a loan of 40,000 som (KGS) to buy 10 sheep to fatten up and resell.  Upol will invest the profits from the loan in expanding her business.

loans.use: to purchase 10 sheep for fattening up and resale

loans.name: Cristita

texts.en:
Cristita makes a living through her retailing business. She runs a sari-sari (variety) store in Pagadian and earns a promising income to support her family. She has signed up for her membership with PMPC to gain access to capitalization. 

She wants to increase her inventory. Now, she has availed herself of a loan to to restock her store with basic commodities like noodles, sugar and oil. Cristita hopes to sustain her business and dreams to send all her chlidren to school.

loans.use: to restock her store with basic commodities like noodles, sugar and oil.

loans.name: Anecita

texts.en:
Anecita finds pleasure in doing her gardening activities. Not only is she doing her hobby, she earns an income as well. 

At the age of 35 and married, she busies herself to sufficiently provide for the family. She grabbed the opportunity to become a full-pledge member of PMPC. She take credit from the cooperative for her capital in supporting her gardening activities. 

Recently, she applied for a loan to purchase gardening tools and fertilizers. In the future, Anecita wishes to become the supplier of flowers in the neighboring towns.

loans.use: to purchase gardening tools and fertilizers

loans.name: Emma

texts.en:
As a married parent of six children, Emma works hard to support her family.

She has a buying and selling of fruit business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from a general store. Emma is borrowing 30,000 PHP through NWTF to buy more fruit to sell for her buying and selling of fruit business.

Emma has been sustaining her business activities through her past nine loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more fruit to sell

loans.name: Gulmairam

texts.ru: Гулмайрам, 45 лет, вдова, 3 детей. У Гулмайрам среднее образование, она в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи, 20 лет назад начала заниматься сельским хозяйством, начав этот бизнес с 10,500 сом (KGS). В хозяйстве Гулмайрам есть 3 коровы, 5 овец. Есть земельный участок мерою 0,30 Га, однако пока Гулмайрам ничего не выращивает. Ежемесячный доход составляет до 25,000 сом (KGS), этих средств катастрофически не хватает на достойную жизнь Гулмайрам и ее детей, поэтому в целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, она обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 150,000 сом (KGS) на покупку 4 нетелей. Доходы от кредита Гулмайрам планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение своего бизнеса.
texts.en:
Gulmairam is a 45 year old widow and mother of three children.   She has a secondary level education and her family's primary source of income is the agricultural business she started 20 years ago with a capital of 10,500 som (KGS). Gulmairam now has three cows and five sheep.  She also has 0.3 ha of land, although she does not currently plant anything there.  Her monthly income amounts to 25,000 som (KGS), but this is tragically too little to provide a decent life for her children or herself.

Because of this, Gulmairam's goal is to develop her business and she has applied to Bai Tushum Bank CJSC for a loan of 150,000 som (KGS) to buy four heifers.  Gulmairam plans to invest the profits from her loan in further expanding her business.

loans.use: to purchase four heifers to increase the profits from her business

loans.name: Zarrina

texts.ru: Заррина жительница дружелюбного городка под названием Куляб. Ей 26 лет. Она не замужем и живет вместе с родителями. Она очень добрая, мудрая и приятная в общении девушка. Заррина в течение нескольких лет занимается предоставлением услуги портнихи. Она любит свою работу и старается каждый свой заказ выполнить как можно быстрее и качественнее. К каждому клиенту у нее свой индивидуальный подход. Заррина набралась большого опыта за весь период своей работы, она работала на этой швейной машинке (которая на фотографии), сейчас ей важно создать условия работы. Она хочет купить новую современную машинку, так как ей становится тяжелее работать. Из-за отсутствия достаточных денежных средств на покупку новой швейной машинки Заррина обратилась за кредитом.
texts.en:
Zarrina lives in a friendly little city called Kulob.  She is 26 years old, not married, and lives with her parents.  She is a very kind, intelligent, and pleasant young woman.  For the last several years, Zarrina has been in business offering sewing services.  She loves her work and tries to fulfil each order as quickly and with as high quality as possible.  She takes a personal approach to each of her clients.  She has gained a great deal of experience in the time she has been doing this.  She has been using the sewing machine seen in the photograph, but now she needs to improve her working conditions.

Zarrina would like to buy a new, modern sewing machine as this one is getting difficult to work with.  Since she does not have the necessary funds to buy a new sewing machine, Zarrina has applied for a loan.

loans.use: to buy a new sewing machine

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to build a bedroom to improve her family's quality of life.

loans.name: Debora

texts.en:
Debora is in her mid 30s, single, and has two children who attend school. For the past 13 years, she has been selling fish from her food stand. She works from 10 a.m. to 10 p.m. daily and makes a fair monthly income for her family. 

This is Debora's tenth loan from Tujijenge. She used her past loans to purchase supplies for her stand. With the profits she was able to start renovating her home, and purchase a sofa, fridge, and television. 

Debora plans to use this loan to purchase more fish to help her improve her business and increase profits. She dreams of earning enough profit to one day own her own car.

loans.use: to improve her business of selling fish

loans.name: Jennifer

texts.en:
Jennifer is a businesswoman from Bayao, Tukuran. She is 43 years old, married and has expertise in selling. She runs a little sari-sari (variety) store and earns a meager income that sufficiently supports her family. 

Jennifer is a full-fledged member of PMPC and has taken several loans already. She maintains her membership in good standing without records of default. Now, she applied for a loan to restock her store with basic commodities and other consumable items. 

Jennifer continues to look for better business opportinuites, proof that she has the passion and the energy to make ends meet for her family.

loans.use: to restock her store with basic commodities and other consumable items

loans.name: Celestina

texts.en:
Celestina is 62 years old and lives in Pagadian City, Zamboanga del Sur, Philippines. She is married with 4 adult children. 

Celestina has managed her sari-sari store and carinderia for 3 years. In order to meet the demands of her customers, she has requested a loan to both buy meat and spices for her carinderia and restock her sari-sari store.  

Celestina has been a member of Paglaum Multi-Purpose Cooperative for 4 years. In the future, she wants to improve her business.

loans.use: to both buy meat and spices for her carinderia and restock her sari-sari store.

location.town: Pagadian - Pagadian City, Zamboanga del Sur

loans.name: Irish Chona

texts.en:
Irish Chona signed up for membership with PMPC and accessed the needed capital to start a sari-sari store business. She is thankful for the capital PMPC extends to a small-time borrowers like her. 

Irish Chona has been able to turn the tide in her favor and has made good sales these days. She wants to take advantage of the good fortune. Recently, she accessed a loan to restock her store with basic merchandise like canned goods, oil, and soy sauce. In the future, she hopes to build a decent home for the family.

loans.use: to restock her store with basic merchandise like canned goods, oil, and soy sauce

location.town: Pagadian - Pagadian City, Zamboanga del Sur

loans.name: Mwero

texts.en:
Mwero is a single woman and has been blessed with three children, all of whom attend school. She lives at her own house that has neither electricity nor piped water. 

She has operated a fish selling business for over one year, selling from home to restaurant operators and passersby. She faces a major challenge of seasonality and transportation issues.

With the 40,000 Kenyan shillings, she wants to purchase bundles of fish for resale. She dreams of expanding her business and establishing another business in the near future.

loans.use: to purchase bundles of fish for resale

loans.name: Shmagi

texts.en:
Shmagi is 26 years old. He lives with his parents in Zestaponi district. Shmagi and his parents are unemployed at the moment, and the family lives in poverty. 

Shmagi is a very hardworking young man and wants to start his own business. The Start Up program, which is a joint initiative with Kiva and Credo, enables him to get a loan of 1,000 GEL. With the received credit, he will open a bakery and will bake Georgian bread. This will give him a chance to generate income and expand the business in the future. Shmagi awaits your support.

loans.use: to open a bakery and bake Georgian bread

loans.name: Khade's Group

texts.fr:
Ce groupe crée depuis Mai 2011,est constitué de 7 membres qui habitent pratiquement tous dans le même quartier.Leur activité principale est le commerce.

Khadé,se trouvant debout a droite de la photo et levant le bras,est notre emprunteuse vedette.Elle est mariée et mère de cinq enfants dont deux garçons et trois filles.Elle fait de la transformation et du commerce de fonio et de karité.

avec son prêt,elle compte acheter 06 sacs de 50 kg de fonio à 150000f dont 25000f le sac, 03 bidons de 20l de miel à 150000f dont 50000f le bidon,03 bidons de 20l de karité à 150000f dont 50000f le bidons et le reste constitue a payer les frais de transport et les petites dépenses.

Pour son bénéfice,elle compte renforcer son épargne et son fond de commerce.
texts.en:
This group was created in May 2011. It is made up of seven members who live almost without exception, in the same district. Their main activity is commerce.

Khade, who is standing on the right of the photo with her arm raised is our featured borrower. She is married with five children of whom two boys and three girls. She works in the transformation and trade of fonio and Shea.

With her loan, she plans to buy six sacks of 50 kg of fonio for 150000F at 25000F per sack, three cans of 20 litres of honey for 150000F at 50000F per can, three cans of 20 litres of Shea for 150000F at 50000 per can and the remainder will be used to pay for the transport of the merchandise and petty expenses.

For her profit, she plans to increase her savings and her business assets.

loans.use: to buy merchandise.

loans.name: Dionesia

texts.en:
Dionesia is a hardworking mother. At 65 years old, she bravely provides the best for her 5 adult children. 

Buying and selling coconuts is Dionesia's primarily source of income, which earns her approximately of 10,000 PHP in gross monthly income.  

Dionesia is thankful she joined Paglaum Multi-Puprose Cooperative because of the programs and services it offers its members.  

Now, Dionesia is applying for her 4th loan cycle in the amount of 14,500 PHP. She will use her loan to acquire coconut farmland so she can increase her income.  

Dionesia dreams that she can save more with Paglaum MPC for her retirement.

loans.use: acquire coconut farmland.

loans.name: Lynie

texts.en:
Lynie is 51 years old. She is very responsible with her household obligations since she has always helped her husband to provide the best for their family. She currently lives with her husband and three children. They are farmers who plant rice.

Lynie wants to increase sales. Consequently, she has requested a loan that will enable her to purchase seeds, compost and fertilizer and to pay labor for plowing their rice field, so that they can continue to put bread on the table in their home and provide better education for their children.

loans.use: to pay labor for plowing the rice field

loans.name: Jicyl

texts.en:
Jicyl has successfully repaid her previous loan from Gata Daku Multi-Purpose Cooperative. She is now requesting another loan in the approved amount of 6,500 PHP for maintenance of her squash farm. 

Jicyl needs financial assistance to buy fertilizers and to pay for the cost of labor to clean her farm for the upcoming abundant harvest.

Jicyl plans to both use the extra income generated from her farm for her child's education and to save for future emergency needs.

loans.use: to pay for farm labor and purchase fertilizer such as manure.

loans.name: Juan

texts.es:
Juan tiene 50 años de edad, vive en casa familiar de material rústico con su cónyuge y su hijo en la parte rural del distrito de San Felipe que se encuentra ubicado en la provincia de Jaén, región Cajamarca, en la sierra norte de Perú. Los pobladores de este distrito se dedican principalmente a la agricultura, ganaderia y comercio.

El se dedica a brindar servicios de carpintería, cuenta con un taller en el cual elabora muebles de madera como mesas, sillas, cómodas, entre otros. Adicionalmente se dedica al cultivo y venta de lima. Cuenta con más de 10 años de experiencia en este negocio. El destino del crédito será para la compra de una mayor cantidad de insumos como madera, fierros, clavos, entre otros, para implementar su negocio, con esto Juan espera ofrecer una mayor variedad de productos a sus clientes lo que tendrá un impacto positivo en su nivel de ingresos y le permitirá mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Juan, aged 50, lives in a rustic family house with his spouse and child in the rural part of the San Felipe district, which is located in the Jaén province in the Cajamarca region, found in Peru's Northern Sierra. The district's population work principally in farming, ranching and commerce.

Juan works as a carpenter, he has a workshop in which he builds wooden furniture such as tables, chairs and drawers. He also grows and sells limes, in which he has over 10 years experience. 

This loan will be to buy more supplies, such as wood, iron and nails for his business, with which Juan hopes to be able to offer a larger variety of products to his customers. This will have a positive impact on his level of income and will allow him to improve his and his family's quality of life.

loans.use: to buy more supplies, such as wood, iron and nails for his business.

loans.name: Aluphos

texts.en: Aluphos is 31 years old, married, and has two children. He lives in Hoima, Uganda. He operates a retail shop mainly selling plastics, salt, sugar, and other items. He gets additional income from farming. He hopes to expand and develop his business, but he is challenged by price fluctuations affecting retail items. Aluphos will use the loan to buy more inventory like salt, soap, and sugar to sell.

loans.use: to buy more inventory like salt, soap, and sugar

loans.name: Yrysbubu

texts.ru: Ырысбубу, 34 года, замужем, мать 3 детей дошкольного возраста. У Ырысбубу - высшее образование, она в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи занимается животноводством и полеводством. Благодаря упорному труду Ырысбубу, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется 2 дойные коровы. На участке мерою 2,0 Га арендованной земли, она выращивает люцерну, перец для продажи. Накопленные средства Ырысбубу старается вкладывать в развитие и расширение бизнеса. Она обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 120,000 сомов (KGS) на покупку 2 дойных коров и 1 бычка для увеличения поголовья скота. Ырысбубу планирует увеличить доходы от бизнеса и направить прибыль на развитие ее бизнеса.
texts.en:
Yrysbubu is 34 years old, married, and the mother of three young children.  She has a higher education, but her family's main income is from Yrysbubu's farming and cattle business.  As a result of her hard work she has two milking cows.  She also rents 2 ha of land where she raises alfalfa and peppers, which she sells.  Yrysbubu tries to invest her earnings in the development and expansion of her business.

Yrysbubu has applied for a loan of 120,000 som (KGS) to buy two milking cows and a steer to increase the size of her herd.  Her plan is to increase her income and use the profits for developing her business.

loans.use: to purchase two dairy cows and one steer in order to increase her livestock business

loans.name: Cherryl

texts.en:
Cherryl is a married woman with four children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Cherryl is 37 years old and three of her children are still in school.

Cherryl has a fishing business in the Philippines. She requested a 10,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy additional materials for her fishing business like fish nets and bamboo.

Cherryl has been in this business for 10 years. She would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional materials for her fishing business like fish nets and bamboo.

loans.name: Cecelia

texts.en:
Cecelia is 56 years old and married with eight children.

Cecelia works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a 30,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy more items to sell like condiments, eggs, canned goods, beverages, etc.

Cecelia has borrowed and paid nine loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 30 years and also earns an income from buying and selling root crops.

Cecelia aspires to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more items to sell like condiments, eggs, canned goods, beverages, etc.

loans.name: Burulbubu

texts.ru: Бурулбубу успешно погасила свой кредит, использовав его по назначению. Она благодарна Фонду Кива и всем, кто помог ей в финансировании. На сегодняшний день Бурулбубу имеет 6 коров, 3 овцы. В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Бурулбубу обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS) на покупку 6 овец. Доходы от кредита она планирует вложить в дальнейшее развитие своего бизнеса, она мечтает увеличить поголовье овец до 50 голов, а также хочет построить дом.
texts.en:
Burulbubu successfully paid off her last loan, using the funds as intended.  She is grateful to Kiva and to all those who helped her with financing.  Today, Burulbubu has six cows and three sheep.  

With the goal of developing her business further, she has applied to Bai Tushum Bank CJSC for a loan of 50,000 som (KGS) to buy six sheep.  She plans to use the profits from the loan in continued business development.  Burulbubu's dream is to grow her herd of sheep to 50 head and to build a house.

loans.use: to buy six sheep in order to increase her herd

loans.name: Erlinda

texts.en:
Erlinda is 45 years old and married with two children who are in school. Erlinda works very hard to provide for them.

She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a 10,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy items to sell, like shampoo, groceries, etc.

Erlinda has been in this business for two years.

She would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy items to sell, like shampoo, groceries, etc.

loans.name: Savlatbi

texts.ru: На фотографии Савлатби. Ей 43 года. Она проживает в городе Куляб. Савлатби доброжелательная и ответственная женщина. У нее трое детей и муж. Муж предоставляет услуги ремонта домов. Савлатби занимается выпечкой и продажей лепешек. Мимо ее лавки нельзя пройти мимо, запах новоиспеченных лепешек сильно притягивает, и оторваться очень тяжело. Савлатби в этой сфере деятельности 14 лет. Экономическое положение страны очень влияет на рынок и Савлатби необходимо удержать бизнес. Поэтому ей сейчас нужны деньги, чтобы купить дрова, муки, масло, дрожжи и т.д. За счет денежных средств от кредита она сможет купить все эти продукты. Вы можете помочь Савлатби, помогите ей.
texts.en:
Pictured here is Savlatbi.  She is 43 years old and lives in the city of Kulob.  Savlatbi is a kind-hearted and responsible woman.  She has a husband and three children.  Her husband is in business doing home repairs.  Savlatbi has a business baking and selling flatbreads.  It's impossible to walk by her bakery stand without being drawn in by the smell of her fresh baked flatbreads and it's very difficult to leave.  Savlatbi has been in this business for 14 years.

Her country's economic situation has a strong influence on the market and Savlatbi needs to keep her business going.  For this purpose, she needs money to buy firewood, flour, oil, yeast, etc.  With the loan proceeds she will be able to buy all of this.  You can help Savlatbi.  Please do.

loans.use: to buy wood, flour, oil, etc.

loans.name: Diaraye's Group

texts.fr:
Ce groupe crée depuis Mai 2011,est constitué de 23 membres dont la majeur partie d'entre elles  habite dans la même localité.Leur activité principale est commerce.

Ndeye,se trouvant assis à droite de la photo,levant le bras,est notre emprunteuse vedette.Elle est veuve et mére de neufs enfants( sept garçons et deux filles) dont l'ainé a 50ans et le cadet 25 ans.Elle fait de la transformation et du commerce de détails pour mener bien son activité.

Avec son prêt, elle compte acheter 25kg de fonio traité à 25000f, un sac de maïs à 10000f et 15000f pour la main d’œuvre.

Pour son bénéfice,elle compte renforcer son épargne et son fond de commerce.
texts.en:
This group was created in May 2011. It is made up of 23 members who almost without exception, live in the same district. Their main activity is commerce.

Ndeye, who is sitting on the right of the photo with her arm raised is our featured borrower. She is a widow with nine children (seven boys and two girls) of whom the oldest is 50 years old and the youngest 25. She works in the transformation and retail trade to make her business function well.

With her loan, she plans to buy 25 kg of processed fonio for 25000F, one sack of corn for 10000F and to use 15000F for labour costs.

With her profits, she plans to increase her savings and her business assets.

loans.use: to buy merchandise.

loans.name: Manuel

texts.en: Manuel has a corn farm in Siloy, Philippines, which is the primary source of income for her family. To generate additional earnings, he wants to plant peanuts and grow root crops. Manuel makes it a point to have good land preparation in order to maximize yield and earn a good income. He recently needed a loan to pay for the clearing, plowing and holing of his land, and planting of seedlings. He borrowed from Paglaum MPC. Manuel wishes to have more produce and to be able to supply agri-products in the market.

loans.use: to pay for the clearing, plowing and holing of his land, and planting of seedlings.

loans.name: Sonia

texts.en:
Sonia became a member of Paglaum Multi-Purpose Cooperative in 2012 and has been able to take advantage of the financial assistance it extends. 

Sonia required sufficient amounts for her farming activities. She feels she owes her fortune to the Cooperative for having trusted her with the money she used as capital. 

Now, Sonia has taken another loan to purchase seedlings and compost. This will help give her farming income a big boost. 

Sonia looks for better business opportunities and would love to be in the position to help others.

loans.use: to buy seedlings and compost.

loans.name: Leciel

texts.en:
As a married parent of four children, Leciel works hard to support her family.

Leciel has a pig-fattening business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from buying and selling nipa roofing. Leciel is borrowing 22,000 PHP through NWTF to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs for her pig-fattening business. She successfully repaid her previous loan and now she has requested another loan to further build her businesses.

Leciel has been sustaining her business activities through her past nine loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Ilyos

texts.ru: Ильёсу  30 лет. Он женат имеет одного ребенка. Образование у Илёса среднее. Живет Илёс со своей женой и ребенком вместе с родителями. Занимается разведением и выращиванием мелкого рогатого скота.  Жена Илёса не работает  , она занимается хозяйством и воспитанием ребенка.  Илёсу приходится  содержать свою семью и поддерживать пожилых родителей. Так как зима время когда можно приобрести  мелкий рогатый скот подешевле Илёс хочет воспользовавшийся моментом приобрести дополнительно ягнят для увеличения поголовья и для этой цели он хочет взять недостающую сумму в МДО «Арванд» Он надеется при правильном уходе к лету он сможет  продав  ягнят получить за них дополнительно доход для благополучия своей семьи.
texts.en:
Ilyos is 30 years old, married and has one child.  He has a secondary level education.  Ilyos and his family live with his parents.  He is in business breeding and raising cattle.  His wife works taking care of the home and raising their child.  It's Ilyos's job to provide for his family and to take care of his elderly parents.  

Since he can buy cattle for a little less money in the winter, Ilyos wants to take advantage of the season and buy some additional lambs to increase the size of his herd.  He has some money, but not enough and has applied to MDO Arvand, LLC for the difference.  He hopes that by taking proper care of the lambs, he will be able to sell them in the summer and earn additional money for his family's well-being.

loans.use: to buy cattle

loans.name: Jessica

texts.en:
As a married mother of two children, Jessica works hard to support her family.

She has a business selling purified drinking water in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from a general store. Jessica is borrowing 11,000 PHP through NWTF to purchase more stock of purified drinking water to sell to customers.

Jessica has been sustaining her business activities through her past two loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money to expand her business and repair her family's home.

loans.use: to purchase more stock of purified drinking water to sell.

loans.name: Maka

texts.en:
Maka is a 38-year-old married mother. She lives with her husband, 2 children, and her husband's parents in Samtredia district in Georgia. 

Maka is involved in a business breeding and raising livestock. In particular, she has 2 cows and 4 calves. She milks the cows every day and produces dairy products which she sells. 

Maka is very hardworking woman and does her best to generate income. She decided to start additional business activity and has requested a loan. The Start Up program, which is a joint initiative between Kiva and Credo, will enable her to take a 2,000 GEL loan. 

With the credit she receives, Maka will purchase cereals from wholesalers and then resell them with a price markup. This will give her a chance to generate more income and improve her children's living conditions.

loans.use: to begin trading cereals.

loans.name: Rosemary

texts.en:
Rosemary is a married mother of five children, three of whom attend school, while the other two are still too young to attend. She lives in her own house that has neither electricity nor piped water. Her greatest monthly expense is food.

For the past twelve years, Rosemary has operated a business selling clothing door-to-door to her neighbors and passersby. She faces the major challenge of the high cost of transportation. 

With the 50,000 KES loan that Rosemary is requesting, she wishes to purchase bales of clothing for resale. 

Rosemary decided to join Yehu Microfinance Trust in order to access loans which will help her boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase bales of used clothing for resale.

loans.name: Evarista

texts.en:
Evarista is 46 years old and is married with 11 children.

Evarista earns a living by raising pigs in the Philippines. She has been in this business for 3 years and also earns additional income from food vending.

Evarista is borrowing 6,000 PHP through Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation in order to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

Evarista is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to save enough money to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Servete

texts.en:
Servete wants to thank all of the lenders for the previous loan, which she used to purchase thread, needles and other materials for her work. She has been very satisfied with her choice of work and the income that she generates from it. 

She loves what she does and is grateful that she is able to continue her business while her husband continues to work in a bakery. Now, she is requesting a loan for her business again in order to purchase more materials for her work. She knows that the additional material will help to satisfy her customer demand and their requests and hopes that it will then increase her income. In the future she would like to continue to expand her business.

loans.use: To purchase more materials for her handicraft work

loans.name: Obidjon

texts.ru: Обиджон молодой житель района Спитамен. Ему всего 24 лет. Он женат и имеет двоих детей в возрасте 4 и 1 лет. Обиджон шустрый и ответственный человек. Он 5 лет своей жизни занимается торговлей. Обиджон продает продукты питание в магазине. Он любит заниматься таким видом бизнеса. Обиджон хочет начать новый бизнес. Он планирует открыть себе новую торговую точку и будет продавать диски, (фильмы, клипы, музыку). Для совершения данной операции ему нужны деньги. Из-за нехватки денег Обиджон берет кредит. Запрашиваемый кредит поможет ему начать новый бизнес и улучшить деятельность. Обиджону очень надеется Ваша помощь. Поддержите его с финансовыми трудностями. Он заранее выражает свою благодарность.
texts.en:
Obidjon is a young man who lives in the Spitamen region.  He is only 24 years old and he is married with two children, aged 1 and 4.  Obidjon is a clever and responsible person.  For the last five years of his life, he has been in the sales business.  He sells groceries in a store.  He loves this kind of business and he wants to start a new business.  He is planning to open a new sales outlet where he will sell CD's and DVD's (movies, short films, music).

To complete the opening of the business, Obidjon needs money and for lack of it is taking out a loan.  The loan he has requested will help him to start the new business and to improve his living.  Obidjon is truly relying on your help.  Please help him in his financial difficulties.  Obidjon would like to express his gratitude in advance.

loans.use: to buy CD's and DVD's to start a new business

loans.name: Norma

texts.en:
Norma learned about Paglaum Multi Purpose Cooperative and the financial assistance it extends. Norma tried her luck on doing a business focusing on her farming activities. She feels she owes her fortune to the Cooperative for having trusted her with the money she used as capital. 

Norma borrowed another amount to pay for fertilizer and seedlings. This will help give her farming income a big boost. Norma looks for better business opportunities and would love to be in the position to help others.

loans.use: to pay for fertilizer and seedlings

loans.name: Nora

texts.en:
Nora is married with four children. She is 62 years old and lives in Marapong, Sibutad. Nora is a farmer and grows vegetable crops to earn a living. She has been doing this for 10 years. 

She has requested a loan to purchase five sacks of fertilizers and a variety of vegetable seedlings. Nora has been a member of PMPC for seven years. In the future, Nora hopes to harvest more vegetable crops to deliver to the nearest market.

loans.use: to pay for seedlings and compost

loans.name: Faymarie

texts.en: Faymarie is 38 years old, married, and has three children. She is a responsible housewife who supports her husband in gaining income. She owns and manages a small eatery within their community. She aims to further improve this business but she has limited capital. For this reason, she is asking for an additional of 50,000 PHP to buy fish, pork, dressed chicken, vegetables and other ingredients and materials needed for her eatery. Through hard work and strong determination, she believes that she will be able to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy fish, pork, dressed chicken, vegetables and other ingredients and materials needed for her eatery.

loans.name: Dilafruz

texts.ru: Дилафруз жительница района Б. Гафуров. Она умная и добрая женщина.  У нее есть 2 летняя дочка. Она разведена с мужем. Дилафруз живет с дочкой. Она работает на спиртном заводе. У нее хорошая работа. Дилафруз хочет получить права на вождения автомобиля. Она сдала документы автошколе. Сейчас ей предстоит учиться и в конце сдать экзамены. Курсы стоят дорого, но желание научиться водить сильнее. Из-за нехватки денежных средств она обратилась за кредитом. Дилафруз верит в Вас и надеется на Вашу поддержку. Ваша поддержка очень важна ей.
texts.en: Dilafruz lives in the B. Gafurov region.  She is an intelligent and kind woman.  Dilafruz is divorced and has a two year old daughter, with whom she lives.  She has a good job in a liquor factory.  Dilafruz wants to get her driver's license.  She has turned in all her paperwork and now all that's left is to study and pass the exams.  Driving school is expensive, but her desire to learn is stronger.  For lack of financial resources, she has applied for a loan.  Dilafruz believes in you and is relying on your support.  It is very important to her.

loans.use: to pay for driving school

loans.name: Apolinaria

texts.en:
As a married parent of four children, Apolinaria works hard to support her family.

She has a coffee-making business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from food vending. Apolinaria is borrowing 11,000 PHP through NWTF to purchase cacao seed to make coffee for her coffee-making business.

Apolinaria has been sustaining her business activities through her past 10 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase cacao seed to make coffee

loans.name: Roda Faith

texts.en:
As a married parent of one child, Roda Faith works hard to support her family.

She has a fishing business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from buying and selling fish.  Roda Faith is borrowing 15,000 PHP through NWTF to buy fishing materials like fishing net, gasoline, etc., for her fishing business.

Roda Faith has been sustaining her business activities through her past three loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy fishing materials like fishing net, gasoline, etc.

loans.name: Airene

texts.en:
Airene is 23 years old, married and has one child in school.

Airene is in the agricultural business of raising pigs in the Philippines. Airene requested a 7,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy feeds and vitamins for her pigs.

Airene has been raising pigs for two years now, and has borrowed four times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Airene would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy feeds and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Vachagan

texts.en:
Vachagan is an inhabitant of the village of Tsovagyugh in the Gegharkunik region of Armenia. He lives here with his beloved wife and pretty daughter. She is a student and future teacher. 

Vachagan worked for many years as a mechanic, but today his sole occupation is farming and agriculture. As he says, he really enjoys his farming and farm that he established little by little over the years. Here, he takes care of 8 cows, 2 calves, 2 bulls, 5 sheep, and 22 chickens. 

Vachagan’s wife is very skilled in making the tastiest cheeses of different types. She sells their farm products such as milk, eggs, and a great assortment of cheeses to her regular customers. And Vachagan sells meat to the butchers in the city who regularly give him orders. So farming is the only source of income for Vachagan and his family, and he does his best to increase it. 

Since the fodder stored over winter is finished, and he needs more to sustain his animals until spring, Vachagan will use this Kiva loan to buy fodder for his cattle.

loans.use: to buy animal fodder for his farm cattle.

loans.name: Aigul

texts.ru: Айгул 36 лет, замужем, вместе с супругой воспитывают 4 детей. У Айгул среднее образование, работу в селе найти очень тяжело, однако надо содержать семью и воспитывать детей. Поэтому уже 6 лет она занимается сельским хозяйством, на сегодняшний день в хозяйстве есть 2 коровы, 20 овец. На участке мерою 1,50 Га она выращивает фасоль. Ежемесячный доход Айгул составляет всего 8,000 сом (KGS). Муж Айгул оказывает сварочные услуги , получая ежемесячный доход в размере около 6,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Айгул обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS) на покупку 2 телят и 20 овец для увеличения поголовья скота. Доходы от кредита она планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины.
texts.en:
Aigul is 36 years old and married.  She and her husband are raising four children.  Aigul has a secondary level education.  It's very difficult to find work in her village, but she still has to support her family and raise the children.  So, six years ago she started an agriculture business and today has two cows and 20 sheep.  She also grows beans on 1.2 ha of land.  Aigul's monthly income amounts to 8,000 som (KGS) in total.  Her husband provides welding services and earns a monthly income of about 6,000 som (KGS).

With an aim to further developing her business, Aigul applied to Bai Tushum Bank CJSC for a loan of 100,000 som (KGS) to buy two calves and 20 sheep to increase the size of her herd.  Aigul plans to invest the profits from her loan in accumulating additional cattle.

loans.use: to purchase two calves and 20 sheep for fattening and subsequent resale

loans.name: Gulandom

texts.ru: Гуландом вместе с сыном живет в районе Спитамен. Ей 46 лет. Гуландом шустрая и трудолюбивая женщина. Она занимается животноводством и параллельно занимается продажей молока. За счет доходов от продажи молока она обеспечивает семью. Гуландом в основном разводит молодых телят и в дальнейшем после откорма перепродает их на скотном рынке. В настоящий момент Гуландом просит кредит, чтобы купить несколько молодых телят, и увеличить поголовье скота и за счет этого увеличить доход от животноводческой деятельности. Это кредит поможет ей приобрести несколько молодых телят и расширить деятельность. Гуландом нуждается в Вашей поддержке.
texts.en:
Gulandom and her son live in the Spitamen region.  She is 46 years old and is a clever and hard working woman.  She is in the cattle business and also sells milk.  With her income from milk sales she provides for her family.  Generally, Gulandom breeds calves and, after raising them and fattening them up, sells them at the cattle market.

Currently Gulandom is requesting a loan to buy several young calves to increase the size of her herd and increase her income from cattle raising.  This loan will help her acquire several young calves and expand her business.  Gulandom is relying on your support.

loans.use: to buy several young calves

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To improve the condition of her kitchen, by installing a pantry and drawers to ensure hygiene.

loans.name: Jamilamo

texts.ru:
Чамиламо проживает вместе семьей в городе Куляб. Она замужняя женщина и мать четырех девочек. У нее не очень большая семья. Дочкам 16,14,12 и 10 лет. Они учатся в средней школе. Ее муж работает бухгалтером в издательском центре. Чамиламо занимается шитьем у себя дома. Она любить сшить национальную женскую одежду, подушек и «Курпа» «Курпача».
   "Курпа" и "курпача"- это ватные матрасы. "Курпа" шьют стандартно квадратном размере, ее используют в качестве одеяла. Курпача длинные матрасы используется как диваны.
 У нее 2 летный опыт работы. Чамиламо хочет купить ткани для подушек, «Курпа» и «Курпача», чтобы не потерять источник дохода. По этой причине Чамиламо обратилась за кредитом. Она шьет и продает их на рынке. Запрашиваемый кредит поможет ей расширить деятельность. В будущем Чамиламо планирует отремонтировать дом от дохода бизнеса. Чамиламо заранее выражает свою благодарность.
texts.en:
Jamilamo and her family live in the city of Kulob.  She is married and the mother of four girls.  She has a very big family.  Her daughters are 16, 14, 12, and 10 years old.  The are all in school.  Jamilamo's husband is a bookkeeper at a publishing center.  Jamilamo does sewing out of her home and she loves to sew traditional women's clothing, pillows, and "kurpa" and "kurpacha."  These are cotton mattresses.  Kurpa are sewn in a standard square size and are used as blankets.  Kurpacha are long mattresses and are used as sofas.  Jamilamo has two years of experience.

Jamilamo wants to buy fabric for pillows, kurpa, and kurpacha so she doesn't lose this source of income.  For this reason she has applied for a loan.  After sewing her goods, she sells them at the market.  The loan she has requested will help her expand her business.  In the future, Jamilamo plans to repair and remodel her home with money she earned in her business.  She would like to express her gratitude in advance.

loans.use: to buy fabric

loans.name: Jim

texts.en:
Jim is a married man blessed with two children with a very supportive housewife. He effectively and fully repaid his previous loan from GDMPC from his transport business income. From this business, he sufficiently provided the daily basic needs of the family.

He needs to pursue or continue this business, for he was aiming to have an extra income for saving for future needs and for his children's education. So, he applied for a loan from GDMPC of 15,000 PHP for repair and maintenance of his transport vehicle. GDMPC approved his application, for he has a good history of repayments.

loans.use: to repaint his transport vehicle and pay for maintenance.

loans.name: Noe

texts.es:
Noe tiene 28 años de edad, es soltero, vive en el distrito de Pucará que se encuentra ubicado en la provincia de Jaén, región Cajamarca, en la sierra norte de Perú. Los pobladores de este distrito se dedican principalmente a la agricultura, ganadería y comercio.

El se dedica al cultivo de café, cuenta con 08 años de experiencia en este sector y con muy buenas referencias personales y laborales en la zona. El préstamo será utilizado para la compra de abono y fertilizantes para el mantenimiento de su cultivo de café, con esto Noe espera ofrecer un café de mayor calidad a sus clientes lo que le generará mayores ingresos y por ende mejorará su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Noe is 28 years old; he is single and lives in the district of Pucará, which is in Jaén Province, Cajamarca Region in Peru's norther mountains.  The inhabitants of this district work mainly in farming, livestock, and commerce. 

He grows coffee for a living; he has eight years of experience in this field and he has very good personal and professional references in the area.  This loan will be used to buy manure and fertilizers to treat his coffee crop.  With this, Noe hopes to offer a better quality coffee to his customers, which will generate more income and thereby improve his quality of life and that of his family.

loans.use: to buy manure and fertilizers to treat his coffee crop

loans.name: Milagros Del Pilar

texts.es:
Milagros del Pilar tiene 20 años de edad, vive en el Distrito de Buenos Aires, una comunidad de clima caluroso su población es amable se dedican a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia de Morropón que pertenece a la Región Piura, costa norte del Perú.

Ella se dedica a la venta de cerveza y chica de jora, una bebida típica de la Región Piura, también tiene sembrado plátano en la parte posterior a su domicilio. Ha solicitado un préstamo para la compra de abonos y fertilizantes para el mantenimiento de su cultivo de plátano y una segunda parte para la compra de cerveza para implementar su negocio y de esta manera generar mayores ingresos para su familia lo que le permitirá tener una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Milagros del Pilar is 20 years old; she lives in the district of Buenos Aires, a community with a hot climate whose residents work in farming, commerce, and livestock.  It is located in the province of Moropón, which is part of Piura Region on Peru's northern coast. 

She sells beer and chicha de jora, a traditional drink from the Piura Region.  She also plants bananas behind her home.  She has requested a loan to buy manures and fertilizers to treat her banana crop and a second part to buy beer to stock her business.  This will generate income for her family, which will allow her to have a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy manures and fertilizers to treat her banana crop, as well as to buy beer for her business

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to start horticulture farming.

loans.name: Farhod

texts.ru: Фарходу 40 лет. Женат. Образование у Фархода среднее. Фарход оказывает населению услуги по ремонту жилья. Это занятие является основным источником дохода его семьи. Жена Фархода  работает посудомойщицей в одной  столовых города и вносит свой вклад в бюджет семьи. У Фархода двое детей и они учатся в школе.  Для того, чтобы  обеспечить нормальное существование семьи ему приходится много трудиться.  Но Фарход не  падает духом, образование детей  не всегда хватает.   Фарход усваивает новые  стили в ремонте жилья и старается  творчески относится к ремонту. Для воплощения своих способностей ему необходимо   приобрести инвентарь и инструментов. Для этой цели он хочет взять кредит и предоставляя более качественные услуги тем самым  увеличить доходность от своего ремесла. Фарход заранее благодарен  «Арванд» в оказании помощи и поддержке.
texts.en:
Farhod is 40 years old and married.  He has a secondary level education.  He offers home repair services to the public.  This business is his family's main source of income.  Farhod's wife is a dish washer at one of the city's eateries and she makes her own contribution to the family budget.  Farhod has two children who are in school.  In order to provide the family with a normal standard of living, Farhod has to work a lot.  He doesn't lose heart even if sometimes he doesn't have enough for his children's education.  He learns new styles in home repair and he tries to take a creative approach to his work.

To live up to his abilities, Farhod needs to buy new equipment and tools.  For this purpose he wants to take out a loan and to increase his income by offering higher quality services.  Farhod is grateful in advance to MDO Arvand, LLC for offering help and support.

loans.use: to buy construction tools

loans.name: Reyna

texts.es:
La señora Reyna de 43 años  de edad,  es madre  soltera no tiene hijos que dependen de ella, vive en casa de propia  se dedica desde hace 06 años al negocio de venta de ropa interior y ropa para damas, caballeros, calzado, etc.
Doña Reyna su venta es de lunes  a domingo, sus cliente son los amigos y personas que a diario visitan su negocio, también vende lácteos en su carro hacia en El Salvador.
Doña Reina es una mujer trabajadora con deseos de salir adelante, está solicitando el préstamo para compra de zapatos, camisas y pantalones escolares,  con el apoyo del préstamo pretende mejorar su negocio y tener más utilidades, es un cliente que solicita su octavo préstamo. Su sueño es seguir mejorando en su negocio.

San Lorenzo, Honduras - Enero del 2015.
texts.en:
Reyna is 43 years old and a single mother without dependent children who lives in her own house.  For six years, she has made a living selling undergarments, footwear, clothes for men and women, etc.  Reyna sells her clothing from Monday to Sunday and her clientele consists of her friends and people who visit her business daily.  She also sells dairy products made in El Salvador from her car.  

Reyna is a hardworking woman with the wish to move forward in life.  She is requesting this loan to purchase shoes, shirts, and school pants.  With the support of the loan, she hopes to improve her business and to have more profits. This is the eighth loan that she is requesting.  Her dream is to improve her business.

San Lorenzo, Honduras - January 2015

loans.use: to purchase shoes, shirts, and school pants for her business

loans.name: Saida

texts.en:
Saida is a brave woman. She was born in 1976. She is living in a rural area. She is married. She has two children. Her husband is a bus driver. 

For about ten years, she has been working as a medical nurse. It is hard for her and her husband to feed a family. She had a dream to educate her children. The salary which they get is not enough to enter her son into university. She is asking for financial support to pay tuition for her son’s university and for buying a ticket.

loans.use: to pay tuition and to buy a ticket

loans.name: Ma. Lina

texts.en:
From Cavite, Philippines, Ma. Lina is married and has children. She is employed in a garment factory in Cavite through the auspices of the Center for Community Transformation Credit Cooperative (CCT). Ma. Lina works as a seamstress, sewing clothing according to the company's or client’s requirements. She uses a sewing machine and other stitching machines as well as handstitching hems and linings.

One of the main dilemmas of employees like Ma. Lina is meeting family expenses without access to savings or credit. Workers can become heavily indebted to money lenders who take their ATM cards as loan collateral. 

For this reason Ma. Lina is asking for your assistance to help her circumvent loan sharks. She has previously accessed loans through CCT and had no problem in repaying them since the loan payments were automatically deducted from her paycheck. She is seeking a 12,000 PHP loan to pay for her children’s tuition.

Ma. Lina hopes to give her children a good education. She also dreams to have her own tailoring shop. She looks forward to your positive response and says any amount will surely be of great help. 

CCT works to provide local communities with a trained labor force equipped with the skills required for employment in construction and site development projects. The cooperative assists its members in acquiring those skills necessary for quality jobs, cultivating savings consciousness and providing decent shelter, food, and education for their families. Its core programs include Professional Staff Services, Workers Guild Development, Enterprise Development and Consultancy Services.

CCT staff and volunteers regularly conduct fellowship meetings for factory workers, such as Levita, before starting their daily work routine. Bible readings, prayer devotions, spiritual mentoring and discipleship sessions take place during pre- and after-work hours and breaks, powering up the lives of both volunteer leaders and line workers.

loans.use: To pay for the tuition fees of her children.

loans.name: Wilma

texts.en:
Wilma is 44 years old, married and has four children. 

Wilma is in the agricultural business, raising pigs in the Philippines. Wilma requested a 12,000 PHP loan through NWTF in order to buy feeds and vitamins for her pigs.

Wilma has been raising pigs for five years now, and has borrowed four times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Wilma would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy feeds and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Emelie

texts.en:
Emelie is 45 years old and married with nine children.
